channel.title: Helpful Coordinates Cheatsheet (by walking direction)
channel.description:
[b]Coordinates Cheatsheet[/b] [i]For walking[/i] Well, I needa fix my NPC walking and fixing facing, so I came up with this cheatsheet. Basically, this si for the coordinate change when you walk to a direction (Ex: Walking North, South-West, etc.).
Base: 3212, 3463 North-East: 3213, 3464 +1 - X +1 - Y North: 3212, 3464 +0 - X +1 - Y North-West: 3211, 3464 -1 - X +1 - Y East: 3213 3463 +1 - X +0 - Y West: 3211, 3463 -1 - X +0 - Y South-East: 3213, 3462 +1 - X -1 - Y South: 3212, 3462 +0 - X -1 - Y South-West: 3211, 3462 -1 - X -1 - Y
[b]P.S: We really need a configuration section IMO.[/b]

item.title: Helpful Coordinates Cheatsheet (by walking direction)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:529475”]you had to make a cheat sheet to tell you which coordinates increment when walking?
NW Y NE
|
| ^
| |
| POS
X---------------|---------------X
| NEG
| |
| v
|
SW Y SE

     <-- NEG            POS-->

its simple coordinates on a plane and cardinal directions[/quote]
Meh.

Read full topic

item.title: Helpful Coordinates Cheatsheet (by walking direction)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Coordinates Cheatsheet
For walking

Well, I needa fix my NPC walking and fixing facing, so I came up with this cheatsheet. Basically, this si for the coordinate change when you walk to a direction (Ex: Walking North, South-West, etc.).

Base: 3212, 3463

North-East:
3213, 3464
+1 - X
+1 - Y
North:
3212, 3464
+0 - X
+1 - Y
North-West:
3211, 3464
-1 - X
+1 - Y
East:
3213 3463
+1 - X
+0 - Y
West:
3211, 3463
-1 - X
+0 - Y
South-East:
3213, 3462
+1 - X
-1 - Y
South:
3212, 3462
+0 - X
-1 - Y
South-West:
3211, 3462
-1 - X
-1 - Y

P.S: We really need a configuration section IMO.

Read full topic
